name: Chult Weather
description: Determines what rain, if any, occurs during an 8 hour period. During periods of heavy rain there is a 25% chance for a tropical storm.

results.notes: Can collect 0.5 gal of water in 8 hours.
Can collect 1.5 gal of water in 8 hours. Visibility is limited to 150 ft. Missile weapon range reduced by half.
